long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Omnibookmarks is the fastest way to save and open bookmarks. Just type a keyword into the address bar to quickly open or add a bookmark.

Benefits:

‚ö°Ô∏è Lightning fast
üìñ Saves to the browser's built-in bookmarks folder
üîê Open source, with simple source code that is easy to audit and trust

Usage:

‚Ä¢ First, activate Omnibookmarks by typing the letter "b" into the address bar, followed by a space.

‚Ä¢ Next, you can add, open, or remove a bookmark by typing a keyword into the address bar. To add a bookmark for the current page, type "+" followed by the keyword you want to assign it, and press Enter.

‚Ä¢ To open a bookmark you previously added, type its keyword and press Enter.

‚Ä¢ To remove a bookmark you previously added, type "-" followed by its keyword, and press Enter:

‚Ä¢ Omnibookmarks saves pages to a bookmarks folder named "Omnibookmarks". This folder is placed in "Other Bookmarks" by default, but you can move it to a different location if you want.
